info.abstract: The MOOCdb Feature Extractor component extracts longitudinal features from a MOOCdb database.
info.description:
This component extracts longitudinal data from a MOOCdb. The available featrues are listed below:
pset_grade_over_time
pset_grade
dropout
lab_grade_over_time
sum_observed_events_duration
lab_grade
number_of_forum_posts
number_of_forum_responses
number_of_wiki_edits
average_length_of_forum_posts
percent_of_average_number_of_attempts
distinct_attempts
percentile_of_average_number_of_attempts
number_of_attempts
distinct_problems_correct
average_number_of_attempts
sum_observed_events_duration_per_correct_problem
number_problem_attempted_per_correct_problem
average_time_to_solve_problem
observed_event_timestamp_variance
number_of_collaborations
max_duration_resources
sum_observed_events_book
sum_observed_events_lecture
sum_observed_events_wiki
attempts_correct
percent_correct_submissions
average_predeadline_submission_time
difference_feature_3
difference_feature_10
difference_feature_11
difference_feature_9
difference_feature_4
difference_feature_5
difference_feature_12
std_hours_working
time_to_react
final_grade

ul.li: MOOCdb file: contains the name of the new MOOCdb created.
MOOCdb-features file: contains names of all available longitudinal features. This is used by the succeeding feature extraction component.
feature_descriptions.txt: contains all features that are available and brief description for each.
moocdb_features.txt: contains the extracted longitudinal features.
Start date (format is yyyy-mm-dd, if not provided, the earliest submission time for the course is used)
Export format (tall or wide, default is tall)
